title: Client Issues patch 7.5
body:
I've been having trouble connecting to games and returning to the post game lobby on the current client. I have also been experiencing more in game lag than usual. 

I hope there are changes up and coming to fix this, because I've been penalized already because I was unable to connect to a game several times. It is really making my gaming experience unpleasant.

Regards,


Scepio Africanus

replies.body: I've been Trying to join a game and it keeps taking forever,while im waiting i'm apparently in champ select because when I hit the "X" button to try and rejoin I get penalized and penalized and I have to wait 25 minutes...I'm not even at champ select. There's a huge issue with the game and its been doing this for 3 days straight. Very annoying and unpleasant.

It sounds like your network is having issues transitioning from the game server back to the client (pvp.net).  You should go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tighten things up and transfer over.  If you're also having issues connecting to the game, then it may further affirm that a connection issue is happening.  Let me know if it helps.
